compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/ctrlaltdel/Desktop/miniproject_cma.serviceRawFile:
org: cmaproject                # Your Serverless Framework organization name
app: nextblog                   # Your Serverless Framework app name
service: nextjs-app              # Name of the service (this could be your Next.js app name)

provider:
  name: aws                     # AWS as the cloud provider
  runtime: nodejs16.x            # Node.js runtime for AWS Lambda
  region: us-east-1              # AWS region (you can choose another one if needed)

plugins:
  - "@sls-next/serverless-component" # Use the Next.js Serverless component for deployment

nextamplified:
  component: "@sls-next/serverless-component@1.18.0"   # Version of the serverless component
